resources.string: We\'re here to help! If you have any questions or issues, our support team is always ready to assist you
Hello, I need help! My ID:
The action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete?
To confirm, enter your nickname in the field below
Please confirm that you want to log out
Without a subscription nothing will work
You haven\'t received any notifications yet
Start working with Maetry Create your first salon
Select a salon to work with
There is already an appointment scheduled for this time
No appointments scheduled for this day yet
Your salon is closed on this day
To create a complex, combine several procedures
To start working with the salon, create a procedure
Employee should not have active appointments
Please enter the employee\'s name to confirm
Specialist won\'t be able to connect via link
Employee won\'t be able to join using the sent link
Granting this access gives the person full control over the workspace
Want to call a taxi or build a route? Choose the service you want to use
The action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete?
To confirm, enter the salon name in the field below
You don\'t have any appointments yet
You don\'t have any appointments yet
Need to zoom in to search
Before deleting, make sure that all employees are no longer using this position.
Please check the entered information. When everything is ready — click \'Done\' to save
Following the link will sync your order history. The salon associated with this link will be added to your favorites. Do you confirm this action?
Please enter your full address to continue
You\'ve followed a link that will connect you as an employee to the salon associated with this link. After confirmation, you\'ll be able to provide services at this salon. Do you confirm this action?

{completedSteps, plural, one{{completedSteps} of {totalSteps} step completed} few{{completedSteps} of {totalSteps} steps completed} many{{completedSteps} of {totalSteps} steps completed} other{{completedSteps} of {totalSteps} steps completed} }
On the main screen, swipe right to open the auxiliary panel, then tap +.

Go to the work schedule tab. Click on your establishment\'s icon. After setup, you can also set it up for each employee. Remember that the employee\'s schedule must match the establishment\'s schedule
On the dashboard screen, go to the employees section, then tap +
Go to the management tab. In the services section, tap +
In the settings section, scroll down to Danger Zone and click activate
To open the workspace, tap the Posts widget
On the Workspace screen, tap 􀑎, select the client and technician, enter the time and procedure, and then save the appointment by tapping the Create button
Hold the entry and drag it to the side to the time and master you want. Then save the selection by tapping Move Entry.
Touch and hold the entry, in the menu that opens, select the desired status.
In the navigation panel, go to the \nSalon tab and click Add client 􀉯
After entering all the data, go to My Clients section and send the client a link to invite them to the salon.
In the navigation panel, go to the \nSalon tab and click Add a master 􀉯
At the stage of selecting a position for the master, you can select a position created earlier or add a new one.
Once you add a stylist, their cell will appear in the tab of the selected position. From there, you can send them an invitation to join your salon.
In the navigation panel, go to the \nSalon tab and click Add new service 􁥉
At the first stage of creation, specify the name of your service, or select a name from the suggested list by tapping 􀇷
By tapping 􀇷, select a service from the list that has passed the service moderation check. Such services can be flexibly configured, and customers will be able to find you more easily
In the last step, select the masters who will provide this service. After that, clients will be able to easily make an appointment with them.
To open the workspace, tap the Posts widget.
In the workspace, tap 􀑎, then assign the client and technician, set the time and procedure, and save the appointment by tapping the “create” button.
Hold the recording and drag it to the side to the time and master you want. Then save the selection by tapping “move recording”.
Touch and hold the entry, in the menu that opens, select the desired status.
From the Home screen, swipe right to open the secondary panel, then tap 􀑎.
At the creation stage, you will be offered 3 options for the salon schedule: weekly, shift and daily.
The schedule implies separate settings for each week.
Select the number of working and non-working days that will follow each other cyclically. And then set up the hours and breaks on working days.
With a daily schedule, you set up one template that the salon will operate according to every day.
Let\'s start — I\'ll help you set everything up for your needs. First, choose what kind of space you\'re creating
Great! Now enter your salon\'s name — as clients will see it
Add a contact method — so clients can easily reach you
Upload a logo — it will be displayed in your profile and search results
Tell us a bit about yourself and your services — this information will be displayed on your page
Great! Now add your space\'s address so clients can find you easily
To not miss messages from clients, allow notifications
You\'ve disabled push notifications in [settings](%s), enable them there
We found an unfinished salon creation on your site!
Let\'s start with the name — enter it manually or choose from the list
Choosing an existing name will help clients find you faster
Choose a suitable category — it will help clients navigate better
How long does the procedure take?
Tell us what\'s important to know before the procedure
Например: «Принести полотенце, прибыть за 10–15 минут, снять украшения, сообщить о противопоказаниях»
Specify the cost — this information will be displayed on the procedure page
Which specialists will perform this service?
We found an unfinished procedure creation
Add a contact method — so you can always easily reach the client
We found an unfinished client creation on your site!
Choose a position — it determines the access rights and salary calculation method for the new specialist
Tell us a bit about the specialist — clients will see this
You can immediately set up a schedule for the invited specialist
Great! The invitation for the new specialist has been sent successfully
Мы нашли у вас незавершенное создание сотрудника!
Specify the name of the new position
Set the salary amount for this position
Assign access rights for this position
Мы нашли у вас не завершенное создание позиции!
Create a weekly template — each day can be set up individually
Daily schedule — the set schedule will apply to all days of the week
Specify the number of working and off days. Format — working days first, then off days.
For example, \'2 on 2 off\' or any other combination: 5/2, 3/1, etc.
Choose working hours — so clients know when they can book
Please select the client for whom the appointment is being created
Unfortunately, booking is not available on this day — please choose another date
To complete the appointment booking, please **sign in** to the system
Specify the specialist who will perform the service
We found an unfinished post creation on your site!
If you don\'t have a suitable photo now. You can always add it later in profile settings.
By clicking \'Continue\', you agree to the [Privacy Policy](%s) and [Terms of Service](%s)
Sign in or register to use the service on any device.
Do you want to register as a specialist or as a client?
We will also ask for access to your preference data to improve recommendations and optimize your user experience.
Specify a method for the masters to contact you, it will be displayed in the profile
Please provide your phone number or email.\nThis is necessary so that you can always restore access to your account.
Add a workstation to continue registration
You can also add another salon
You can create your first salon
If you have an invitation link, please enter it below
Unfortunately, the entered link is invalid. Please check and enter it again
How shall we call the complex?

**Parallel** – the time for the complex will be calculated based on the longest procedure.\r **Sequential** – the time for the complex will be calculated based on the sum of the times of all procedures.
Congratulations, you have successfully created a complex
We found an unfinished complex creation on your site
The time for the complex will be calculated based on the sum of the time of all procedures.
The time for the complex will be calculated based on the longest procedure.
We found an unfinished post creation on your site!
Enter new name for your salon
To process the link, you need to register as a client
To process the link, you need to register as a specialist
Failed to load image. Check your network connection and try again.
Opening hours are shown in a different time zone
Off time is out of work time
502 Bad Gateway: The server, acting as a gateway or proxy, received an invalid response from the upstream server.
400 Bad Request: The server cannot understand the request due to invalid syntax.
409 Conflict: The request cannot be processed due to a conflict in the request, such as an edit conflict between multiple concurrent updates.
403 Forbidden: The server understands the request but refuses to execute it. Usually related to lack of access rights.
504 Gateway Timeout: The server, acting as a gateway or proxy, did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.
500 Internal Server Error: A general server error. Usually means something went wrong on the server side.
405 Method Not Allowed: The method specified in the request is prohibited for this resource.
404 Not Found: The server cannot find the requested resource. This is the most common error, indicating a non-existent page.
503 Service Unavailable: The server cannot process the request due to temporary overload or maintenance.
401 Unauthorized: Authentication required. User must log in to access.
The complex must contain at least one procedure
Problem with price type and value
Please leave us feedback before app deletion. It will...
Hello! I am writing to share my review of the Maetry application. Below is my review:
